update flowhistroy set Flo_Tmp_ID = #{floTmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Flo_Node_ID = #{floNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bus_ID = #{busId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Starter = #{starter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StarterName = #{startername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDT = #{rdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FK_Dept = #{fkDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeptName = #{deptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NodeName = #{nodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRI = #{pri,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Actor = #{actor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ActorName = #{actorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ActorResult = #{actorresult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, do_date = #{doDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mode_id = #{modeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Flow_Node_Last = #{flowNodeLast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.BusinessName, b.`status`,count(DISTINCT a.URL) FROM flowhistroy a LEFT JOIN mode_status b ON a.mode_id = b.mode_id LEFT JOIN business c ON a.Bus_ID = c.ID where a.Actor=#{userId} and b.`status`=1 GROUP BY a.URL ;
